{{help
|topic=+sheet
|detail=Commands to view your character sheet.
|example=
* '''+sheet''' - see your sheet.
* '''+sheet/all''' - see your entire sheet (may be spammy).
* '''+sheet/<page>''' - see a page of your sheet.
* '''+sheet <player>''' (staff-only) - see a player's sheet.
* '''+sheet/all <player>''' (staff-only) - see a player's entire sheet (may be spammy).
* '''+sheet/<page> <player>''' (staff-only) - see a page of a player's sheet.
